# TUI

The Tinman TUI is a fast, focused interface for running research cycles and demos.

## Launch

```bash
python -m tinman.cli.main tui
```

## Demo Tab

Use the **Demos** tab to run provider demo scripts with editable arguments.

## Screenshots
